casebody.data:
Marsha L. PAYTON, petitioner,
v.
MERIT SYSTEMS PROTECTION BOARD. No. 16-9546. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 2, 2017.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States *306Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
